text: Disney's Hercules or Disney's Hercules Action Game (in Europe titled Disney's Action Games Featuring Hercules) is an platform action video game for the PlayStation, and Windows home consoles. The PlayStation version was released by Virgin Interactive in July 1997, and another game version for Game Boy by THQ released at the same year. The game is based on movie of the same name by Walt Disney Pictures. title: Disney's Hercules
